name: Anime Girls VR
description: Meet kind anime girls and dance with them to the cool songs. All this inside anime styled locations! Anime Girls VR will let you feel presence of characters like they would be next to you. Prepare for the great effort if you want to keep up with the girls!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (or better) Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (or equivalent) Storage: 400 MB available space
